00077 template<class T>
00078         class DispatchKey {
00079     private:
00080         T* _this;
00081         bool (T::*_keyPress)( SDL_Event a);
00082 
00083     public:
00089         DispatchKey(T* object, bool (T::*key)( SDL_Event a) ) {
00090             _this = object;
00091             _keyPress = key;
00092         }
00093 
00094         bool keyPress(SDL_Event event) {
00095             return (_this->*_keyPress)(event);
00096         }
00097     };

00103 template<class T>
00104         class DispatchMouse {
00105     private:
00106         T* _this;
00107         bool (T::*_mouse)( SDL_Event a);
00108 
00109     public:
00115         DispatchMouse(T* object, bool (T::*mouse)( SDL_Event a) ) {
00116             _this = object;
00117             _mouse = mouse;
00118         }
00119 
00120         bool mouseEvent(SDL_Event event) {
00121             return (_this->*_mouse)(event);
00122         }
00123     };
